channel.title: Question About Connection
channel.description:
Hello, I have a problem! Nobody Can't connect to my server! So i tried With hamachi and it worked good. But i want to make without hamachi what should i do? I'm using connections like this:
I'm Using the first on... Not work... So i use hamachi
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img134.imageshack.us/img134/3673/connectup4.png[/img][/URL]
Can i make that somebody could connect without connection when my internet is dial up?
If you need more details i will put more pictures.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 13, 2008, 08:00:01 AM[/size][hr]Any one?
